mapper.select: SELECT NO ,PA_NAME ,PA_TEL ,RRN ,PA_GENDER ,CAREGIVER ,ADDRESS ,PA_DATE ,MEMO FROM PATIENT ORDER BY NO DESC
SELECT NO ,PA_NAME ,PA_TEL ,RRN ,PA_GENDER ,CAREGIVER ,ADDRESS ,PA_DATE ,MEMO FROM PATIENT WHERE NO = ${paNo}
SELECT NO ,TITLE FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE NO IN (40, 50, 60, 70)
SELECT E.NO, E.NAME, P.POTITLE, D.TITLE, E.DEPT_NO FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN POSITION P ON P.NO = E.POSITION_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (E.DEPT_NO = D.NO) WHERE E.QUIT_YN = 'N' AND (P.NO = 2 OR P.NO = 3)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECEIPT ( NO ,STATUS ,PAY ,PA_NO ,SYMPTOM ,EMP_NO ,DEPT_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_RECEIPT_NO.NEXTVAL ,'W' ,'N' ,#{paNo} ,#{symptom} ,#{empNo} ,#{deptNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT R.NO ,P.PA_NAME ,P.PA_GENDER ,R.DEPT_NO ,R.SYMPTOM ,R.EMP_NO ,trunc((to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD'))-to_number(to_char(decode(substr(P.RRN, 8, 1), '1', '19', '2', '19', '20')||substr(P.RRN, 1, 6))))/10000) as "AGE" FROM PATIENT P JOIN RECEIPT R ON P.NO = R.PA_NO WHERE R.STATUS = 'W'

SELECT R.NO ,P.PA_NAME ,P.PA_GENDER ,R.DEPT_NO ,R.SYMPTOM ,trunc((to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD'))-to_number(to_char(decode(substr(P.RRN, 8, 1), '1', '19', '2', '19', '20')||substr(P.RRN, 1, 6))))/10000) as "AGE" FROM PATIENT P JOIN RECEIPT R ON P.NO = R.PA_NO WHERE R.STATUS = 'S'
mapper.update: UPDATE RECEIPT SET STATUS = 'S' WHERE NO = #{no} AND STATUS = 'W'
mapper.select: SELECT R.SYMPTOM, R.EMP_NO, R.DEPT_NO, P.PA_NAME, P.RRN, P.PA_GENDER, TH.PA_NO FROM RECEIPT R JOIN PATIENT P ON R.PA_NO = P.NO JOIN TM_HISTORY TH ON R.PA_NO = TH.PA_NO WHERE TH.NEEDSURGERY = 'Y'
SELECT R.SYMPTOM, R.EMP_NO, R.DEPT_NO, P.PA_NAME, P.RRN, P.PA_GENDER, TH.PA_NO FROM RECEIPT R JOIN PATIENT P ON R.PA_NO = P.NO JOIN TM_HISTORY TH ON R.PA_NO = TH.PA_NO WHERE TH.NEEDSTAY = 'Y'

SELECT R.PA_NO ,R.EMP_NO ,R.DEPT_NO ,R.STATUS ,R.PAY ,P.PA_NAME ,P.RRN ,P.PA_GENDER ,P.CAREGIVER FROM RECEIPT R JOIN PATIENT P ON R.PA_NO = P.NO JOIN TM_HISTORY TH ON R.PA_NO = TH.PA_NO WHERE TH.NEEDSTAY = 'Y' AND R.PA_NO = #{paNo} AND R.STATUS = 'S'

SELECT R.PA_NO ,R.EMP_NO ,R.DEPT_NO ,R.STATUS ,R.PAY ,P.PA_NAME ,P.RRN ,P.PA_GENDER ,P.CAREGIVER FROM RECEIPT R JOIN PATIENT P ON R.PA_NO = P.NO JOIN TM_HISTORY TH ON R.PA_NO = TH.PA_NO WHERE TH.NEEDSURGERY = 'Y' AND R.PA_NO = #{paNo} AND R.STATUS = 'S'

SELECT R.PA_NO ,R.EMP_NO ,R.DEPT_NO ,R.STATUS ,R.PAY ,P.PA_NAME ,P.RRN ,P.PA_GENDER ,P.CAREGIVER FROM RECEIPT R JOIN PATIENT P ON R.PA_NO = P.NO JOIN TM_HISTORY TH ON R.PA_NO = TH.PA_NO WHERE TH.NEEDSTAY = 'Y' AND R.PA_NO = #{paNo}
